function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor environments","Impact":"Increases the risk of airborne disease transmission and poor air quality","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation systems and air filtration to improve air quality and reduce the spread of contagious diseases","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and natural ventilation techniques","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and HVAC professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate natural light in indoor environments","Impact":"Reduces the ability to mitigate the transmission risk of COVID-19 and impacts mental health","Mitigation":"Maximize natural light exposure by incorporating large windows and skylights in building design","Technologies":"Smart glass, daylighting systems, and architectural design considerations","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and construction professionals"},{"Description":"Lack of hygiene maintenance in the built environment","Impact":"Increases the risk of contagion and the transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols, and design built environments with hygiene in mind","Technologies":"Automated cleaning systems, touchless fixtures, and antimicrobial materials","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and cleaning professionals"}]}
